p.k: Miyazaki Prefecture, with its beautiful seas and tropical foods, draws relatively few foreign tourists. Foreigners residing in Miyazaki gather to discuss how its unique features can increase visitors.
p.d: The 6th episode of COOL JAPAN Outing is in Miyazaki Prefecture. It used to be the number one honeymoon destination and the standard location where professional baseball players went to practice during the off season, but honeymoons were taken overseas and practice locations were taken by Okinawa Prefecture, and its foreign visitor rate hangs low at 39th place in Japan. Something must be done! So, we gathered 8 foreigners living there. They will search for Miyazaki's unusual appeals and cool spots that the world will understand and thoroughly debate them with Shoji KOKAMI.
